results.title: The Emerald forest
results.creator_credit: John Boorman and Embassy Pictures Corporation (US)
results.brief_description: Based on a true story of American engineer Bill Markham (Powers Boothe), whose son is kidnapped while working in Brazil. His son is kidnapped by a tribe called “The Invisible people”, due to their ability to camouflage. Despite the authorities giving up the search, Markham and a French photographer continue the search, until the photographer is killed and the father must go on alone. Cast also includes Meg Foster, Charley Boorman and Rui Polonah. Made in the Amazon rainforest and written by Rospo Pallenberg.

results.title: Marked woman
results.creator_credit: Lloyd Bacon, Hal B. Wallis, Jack L. Warner, Louis F. Edelman and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: A hard boiled B-girl (Bette Davis), is determined to turn the tables on Mobster Johnny Vanning (Eduardo Ciannelli), who has recently taken over the management of the nightclub where she works and is attempting to turn out the current employees. It proves to be hard task for one individual so she enlists the help of a district attorney (Bogart), and her fellow workers at the nightclub (Rosalind Marquis, Lola Lane, Isabel Jewell and Mayo Methot). This film is based on the trial of New York Gangster Lucky Luciano, sent to prison on the basis of evidence from prostitutes.

results.title: Patty Hearst
results.creator_credit: Paul Schrader, Marvin Worth and Zenith Productions
results.brief_description: In 1974 Californian newspaper heiress Patty Hearst (Natasha Richardson), was kidnapped and allegedly brainwashed by terrorists from the Symbionese Liberation Army (SLA). She caused public scandal when she rejected the offer for freedom after 57 days of being confined in a closet and becoming a successful bank robbing urban guerilla. Also starring William Forsythe, Ving Rhames and Frances Fisher. Based on the book “Every secret thing” by Patricia Campbell Hearst and Alvin Moscow.

results.title: Heart condition
results.creator_credit: James D. Parriott, Steve Tisch and New Line Cinema
results.brief_description: A tough cop and a cunning lawyer begin an unlikely alliance when they partner up to find a murderer. Mooney (Bob Hoskins), a tough and bigoted cop suffers a near fatal heart attack while on the job. His life is saved by a successful heart transplant, courtesy of the recently assassinated lawyer, Stone (Denzel Washington). There is only one unexpected side effect from the operation; Stone’s ghost accompanies the transplanted organ. They discover they share more than the operation in common when it transpires that Stone’s hooker girlfriend is the former girlfriend of Mooney. The two have different priorities however, and while Mooney wants to regain his former girlfriend, Stone wants to find his killer, making for a confusion between body and mind. Also starring Chloe Webb.

results.title: The Changeling
results.creator_credit: Peter Medak, Garth Drabinsky and Joel B Michaels
results.brief_description: A grieving composer, George C Scott, moves to Seattle after the tragic death of his wife and daughter in a car accident. He discovers the house he has moved into harbours a secret and is inhabited by the spirit of a child who lived there 70 years ago. He is determined to find the explanation behind the terrifying paranormal activities. Based on a true story this film also stars Trish Van Devere, John Colicos and Jean Marsh

results.title: The Muppet movie
results.creator_credit: James Frawley, Jim Henson and ITC Entertainment
results.brief_description: Kermit the Frog has finally hit the big time and he’s heading for Hollywood. With his fellow Muppets including Miss Piggy, Gonzo, Animal, Fozzie Bear, plus the rest of the Muppet Performers, they encounter real life stars along the way. Kermit begins his journey on a humble bicycle, but as the passengers accumulate along the way his means of transport increases in size. Kermit also has to contend with the slimy Doc Hopper who is eager for Kermit to promote fried frog legs, as well as his strong feelings for Miss Piggy. Features a number of cameos as well as paying homage to several classic films.

results.title: Ring of bright water
results.creator_credit: Jack Couffer, Joseph Strick and Palomar Pictures
results.brief_description: Graham Merril (Bill Travers), a discontented civil servant and his pet otter flee London and head to the western Highlands when they realise city life is not for either of them. He seeks the assistance of local doctor, Mary Mackenzie (Virginia McKenna), to help him and his family of otters.

results.title: Dirty dancing
results.creator_credit: Emile Ardolino, Linda Gottlieb and Vestron Pictures
results.brief_description: The Summer of 1963 is one that Baby (Jennifer Grey) will never forget. While holidaying in the Catskills she stumbles across the daring and exciting world of the dancing staff; driven by the stirring music and sensual moves, known as “dirty dancing”. She becomes the star pupil of the handsome dance instructor, Johnny (Patrick Swayze), and finds herself becoming more that just his dancing partner. Cast includes Cynthia Rhodes, Jerry Orbach and Jack Weston.

results.title: Groundhog Day
results.creator_credit: Harold Ramis, Trevor Albert and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: Have you ever had one of those days where you wished you could relive the day and do things differently? Wise cracking weatherman Phil, (Bill Murray) is living the same day over and over. It all begins when he is sent with other crew members to Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania to cover the annual Groundhog Day Festival; the one day of the year when the seasons weather forecast is decided by an animal. Initially they are to move out after the report but a snow storm leaves them snowbound. With no tomorrow and no consequences to face, Phil is eager to explore every fantasy and possibility, and he does. Trying to enamour himself to the producer Rita, (Andie MacDowall) proves harder than he thought, no matter how long he has to try. Also starring Chris Elliot, Brian Doyle-Murray and Stephen Tobolowsky.

results.title: Sleepless in Seattle
results.creator_credit: Nora Ephron, Gary Foster and Tri-Star Pictures
results.brief_description: Tom Hanks stars as a recently widowed architect with a young son who moves to Seattle on the East Coast of America to escape the painful memories of his life with his wife. Meg Ryan is a recently engaged journalist who believes she has found the perfect man in her fiancee. Its Christmas, the silly season and Hanks young son has called a talk-back show to try and help his Dad move on with life. Ryan hears his conversation with the radio announcer who calls him Sleepless in Seattle. His words strike a chord in Ryan who begins to doubt if her comfortable life is really all she wants. Thus begins a story of chance and double-chance and of finding true love. This one of the most enchanting romantic comedies ever created.
